CustomField.formula: IF ( New_Value__c = "Blue" , 1 , IF ( New_Value__c = "Silver" , 2 , IF ( New_Value__c = "Gold" , 3 , IF ( New_Value__c = "Platinum" , 4 , IF ( New_Value__c = "Inactive" , 1 , IF ( New_Value__c = "New" , 2 , IF ( New_Value__c = "Returned" , 2 , IF ( New_Value__c = "Current" , 2 , IF ( New_Value__c = "Active" , 3 , 0)))))))))
CustomField.label: New Value Score
